main event: A bright, reddish-orange object was sighted hovering and then speeding away in Raceland, Kentucky on April 28, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as larger than a normal aircraft, without any visible wings.
It hovered in the sky for some time before suddenly swerving and disappearing at a high rate of speed.
The witness, a 30-year-old male with 20/20 vision, was certain the object was not a known aircraft, satellite, or any other familiar object.
Several other people in the area also reported seeing the object.
The sighting lasted for approximately 2 hours.
